H0.text: What is the chief river of Burma . Salween

H1.text: What is the chief river of Burma . Sittang

H2.text: What is the chief river of Burma . Chindwin

H3.text: What is the chief river of Burma . IRRAWADDY

A4.text: The Irrawaddy River is the principal river of Myanmar, running through the centre of the country.

A5.text: The Chindwin River is the largest tributary of the Irrawaddy River, which itself is the principal river of Myanmar.
